step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists clenched and arms drawn in. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Excellent! Fingers opened wide and arms extended horizontally. Remember to exhale as you relax.
Great continuation. Keep the arms extended and focus on relaxing the muscles as you exhale.
Good form on the extension. Ensure your wrists stay relaxed and fingers spread.
Well done on completing the first repetition. Remember to return to the starting position with fists clenched.
Second rep starting strong with fists clenched. Keep the muscles tight and inhale.
Nicely done opening the fingers and extending the arms. Exhale and relax.
Good control in this phase. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles.
Arms are extending well. Focus on keeping the wrists loose and fingers spread.
Fantastic! You've completed both repetitions. Remember to return to the starting position for the next set.

exercise_summary: Great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! You consistently followed the instructions to clench your fists, extend your arms, and control your breathing. Keep up the excellent work focusing on relaxed wrists and fingers during the extension phase.
